TEXT.TITLE: COMSTOCK GROUP <CTTK> FINANCIAL OFFICER QUITS
TEXT.BODY: Comstock Group Inc said John Halecky Jr resigned his posts of chief financial officer, executive vice president and director. Frank MacInnis, vice president and director, was named as the new chief financial officer, the company said. Reuter
